    • Method Detail

      • envelopeFomGeoRSSBox

        public static org.opengis.geometry.Envelope envelopeFomGeoRSSBox(Node boxNode)
        Creates an Envelope from a georss:box element. The coordinate reference system is EPSG 4326 (lat,lon axis order).
        Parameters:
        boxNode - An Element node (georss:box) containing the coordinates of the lower and upper corners.
        Returns:
        An Envelope object representing the given spatial extent, or null if it cannot be constructed (a runtime exception may have occurred).
